Title: Relates to factoring domestic violence convictions into certain family court decisions
Summary: Factors domestic violence convictions into family court decisions regarding visitation, custody and parental rights; provides that any parent undergoing mandatory, batterer specific rehabilitation measures shall only be granted supervised visitation.
LawCode: Amd ยง1046, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, in relation to factoring domestic violence convictions into family court decisions regarding visitation, custody and parental rights
